issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Fix synchronization issues in APIs which take in lists

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Similar to YARN-609. There're the following *PBImpls which need to be fixed:
1. GetDiagnosticsResponsePBImpl
2. GetTaskAttemptCompletionEventsResponsePBImpl
3. GetTaskReportsResposnePBImpl
4. CounterGroupPBImpl
5. JobReportPBImpl
6. TaskReportPBImpl
fields.summary: Fix synchronization issues of the setters/getters of *PBImpl which take in/return lists
